services.s1_subTitle: At home, prepare expired or unused medications, and it's also a good idea to separate them from their packaging (cardboard box, leaflet). Pay close attention to the expiration date on the box or blister pack of the medications. Proper separation of medications and packaging contributes to responsible waste management and protects the environment.
services.s2_subTitle: With the help of our application, fill in the details regarding expired or unused medications to simplify the preparation of the delivery statement. This way, you benefit from an efficient and transparent solution in managing and collecting these medications.
services.s3_subTitle: Present the QR code along with the medications you want to deliver at the collection center selected by you.
